name: Honeywell Europe NV
membership: Honeywell Europe NV is a member of several associations, including, but not limited to: AMCHAM EU and CEFIC.
goal: Honeywell is a global technology manufacturing company located in more than 100 countries with approximately 110,000 employees, of which approximately 20,000 employees reside in the EU.  Honeywell's primary interests involving EU institutions include, but are not limited to: energy efficiency, climate change, safety, security, innovation, aviation and product stewardship.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Climate action, in particular Vehicle Emissions, ETS and Fluorinated Greenhouse Gases
- Energy, in particular Energy Efficiency, Energy, Energy Security, Future Transportation Fuels, Renewable Energy
- Functioning of the Internal Market, in particular Eco-Design, Electronic Equipment, Vehicle Type Approval process, REACH
- Trade and Customs, in particular Trade Agreements, Duty Exemptions, Export Controls, Conflict Minerals
- Environment, in particular Air Quality, Waste
- Single European Sky
- Cybersecurity
- Digital Economy
